User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Zua-Car application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

lastLogin.description: The date of the user's last login.

Part.title: Part
Part.description: Represents a vehicle spare part available for sale.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Part entity.

name.description: The name of the spare part.

description.description: A detailed description of the part.

category.description: The category the part belongs to (e.g., Moteur, Freinage).

compatibility.description: A list of vehicle models or types this part is compatible with.

stock.description: The number of items in stock.

definition.description: Stores user profile data. Path-based ownership ensures only the user (or an admin - not modeled here) can access their own data.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

definition.description: Stores spare part information. This collection is public for reading but restricted for writing.

params.name: partId
params.description: The unique identifier of the spare part.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to support user management and a public catalog of spare parts. User data is private, while parts data is publicly readable to all users of the application.
